author: cnbc.com
title: Texas Roadhouse, Inc. to Announce First Quarter Earnings on April 30, 2018
text:
LOUISVILLE, Ky., April 09, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Texas Roadhouse, Inc. (Nasdaq:TXRH) announced today that it will release first quarter 2018 financial results on Monday, April 30, 2018 after the market close. A conference call will follow at 5:00 PM ET and will be webcast live from the investor relations portion of the Company's website at www.texasroadhouse.com .
Listeners may also access the call by dialing (800) 281-7973 or (323) 794-2093 for international calls. A replay of the call will be available until May 7, 2018 by dialing (844) 512-2921 or (412) 317-6671 for international calls. The passcode is 4129643.
About the Company
Texas Roadhouse is a casual dining concept that first opened in 1993 and today has grown to approximately 560 restaurants system-wide in 49 states and eight foreign countries. For more information, please visit the Companyâ€™s Web site at www.texasroadhouse.com .
